arguments.message:
Implemented status indicator UI tweak in `apps/ui/src/components/chat/AgentSidebar.tsx`.
- Replaced text status labels (`active`/`idle`) with icon indicator:
  - `CircleDashed` (Lucide) + `animate-spin` when status is `streaming`
  - blank sized placeholder when idle
- Added accessibility text via `sr-only` (`Working`/`Idle`) while keeping icon/blank `aria-hidden`.
- Added helper `isWorkingStatus(status)` and imported `CircleDashed`.

Validation:
- `pnpm --filter @swarm/ui test`  (5/5 tests passed)
- `pnpm --filter @swarm/ui build`  (successful build; existing upstream warnings only)
